about_the_game:
Peace has reigned on the island of Lyndaria, but the tribes have lived apart for so long that it is now quite difficult for them to unite. Each of them is trying to start a new life, but accepting each other's traditions is not as easy as it seems.

Maya, dreaming of their unity, decides to organize the first Christmas party on the island!

All tribes accept the idea with enthusiasm and they really want to win the competition for the best preparation for Christmas.

The former ruler of the Hand of Tona, Adey, was especially inspired. After Shana was elected queen of the Atlanteans, he lost his “job” and found a new calling for himself - to become Santa Claus.

But Adey turned out to be absolutely unbridled in his enthusiasm and makes a lot of mistakes. We hope that despite the inexperienced Santa, the holiday will still take place on the island!

Christmas Passion DLC Features:

◇ Locations with New Year's decorations

◇ New character

◇ Unique H-scenes

◇ New quests

◇ New costume for Maya

◇ New achievements on Steam

content_descriptors.notes:
All the characters are adults. The game contains nudity and sexual content. 

The game contains sexual scenes between the humans and the furries and the furry scenes.

The game contains adult material and scenes of a sexual nature with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: furry, oral, anal, vaginal, threesome (MMF) , scenes with dildo, domination.

💖 ADD OUR GAMES TO YOUR WISHLIST 💖


About the Game

Peace has reigned on the island of Lyndaria, but the tribes have lived apart for so long that it is now quite difficult for them to unite. Each of them is trying to start a new life, but accepting each other's traditions is not as easy as it seems.

Maya, dreaming of their unity, decides to organize the first Christmas party on the island!

All tribes accept the idea with enthusiasm and they really want to win the competition for the best preparation for Christmas.

The former ruler of the Hand of Tona, Adey, was especially inspired. After Shana was elected queen of the Atlanteans, he lost his “job” and found a new calling for himself - to become Santa Claus.

But Adey turned out to be absolutely unbridled in his enthusiasm and makes a lot of mistakes. We hope that despite the inexperienced Santa, the holiday will still take place on the island!

Christmas Passion DLC Features:

◇ Locations with New Year's decorations

◇ New character

◇ Unique H-scenes

name: Lyndaria: Christmas Passion DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 612
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Peace has reigned on the island, but the tribes have lived apart for so long that it is now quite difficult for them to unite. Each of them is trying to start a new life. Maya, dreaming of their unity, decides to organize the first Christmas party on the island!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
